scripts.client-build: cd client && yarn cache clean --all && yarn install --network-concurrency 1 && yarn build
scripts.server-build: cd server && yarn cache clean --all && yarn install --network-concurrency 1
scripts.own-server-start: cd server && cross-env PORT=3001 yarn start
scripts.own-server-postbuild: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn server-build" "cross-env NODE_ENV=production OWN_SERVER=true yarn client-build"
